name: nextemplates
description: Elevate your Next.js incantations with handpicked spell-snippets. Delve into enchanting code realms with mystical prefixes, woven for utmost efficiency and adaptability. A grimoire for every Next.js mage. Let nexTemplates be the wand to your wizardry!

editor.suggest.snippetsPreventQuickSugge.description: Prevent quick suggestions for snippets. Recommended for optimal use of NexTemplates.
